member.name: RedEyeCorrection.GetParameters
member.summary: The RedEyeCorrection.GetParameters method gets the current values of the parameters of this RedEyeCorrection object.
member.param: The size, in bytes, of the buffer pointed to by the parameters parameter.

Pointer to a buffer that is large enough to receive a structure followed by an array of RECT structures. To determine the total size of the required buffer, call the GetParameterSize method of the RedEyeCorrection object whose parameters you want to retrieve.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: RedEyeCorrection.SetParameters
member.summary: The RedEyeCorrection.SetParameters method sets the parameters of this RedEyeCorrection object.
member.param: Pointer to a structure that specifies the parameters.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.
